definition[0]: something that you compare another thing with, in order to judge how good or successful it is
example[0]: Profit is the most important yardstick of success for any business.
example[1]: These subjects are used as a yardstick against which to measure the childrenâ€™s progress.
definition[1]: a special stick used for measuring things, which is exactly one yard long
definition[2]: something that you use to compare another thing with, in order to judge how good or successful it is
example[2]: Is profit the only yardstick of success?
example[3]: The annual percentage rate is the best yardstick to use when comparing the costs of the different forms of credit.
